spatial_accuracy.notes: General room layout is highly accurate. However, the window placement in the garage is missing, and several interior door swings (notably the Garage-to-Entry and Bed 2) are omitted or incorrectly represented as simple openings.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thicknesses are mostly consistent. The Pantry and Kitchen storage adjacency is preserved. The Garage is missing the internal vehicle rendering and the specific step-down/threshold details. The Alfresco area lacks the specific pillar-wall connection shown in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping, particularly the Theatre sectional and the Study desk layout. The Alfresco furniture is slightly simplified compared to the circular/square mix on the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with clean geometry and consistent soft lighting. Orthographic projection is nearly perfect with very little perspective distortion.

detected_errors.description: Missing vehicle in Garage and missing windows on the right-hand Garage wall.
Hallway door to Bed 2 and Activity room are represented as open voids rather than hinged elements.
Orientation of the toilet in the Ensuite is rotated 90 degrees relative to the 2D plan.
The WIR (Walk-in-Robe) proportions are slightly narrow compared to the Master Suite width.
